title: Front End Developer
subtitle: I like to code things from scratch, and enjoy bringing ideas to life in the browser.
about: I am focused on combine the art of design with the art of programming. Passionate about translating UI/UX design wireframes to actual code and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation using web markup languages like HTML5 and CSS3, server-side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as LESS and SASS, client-side scripting and JavaScript (ES6) libraries, like React

title: My prefered Dev Tools
subtitle: Every developer has their own preference dev tools and frameworks to work with
toolstitle: Tools that make my life easier
about: I'm a React lover. Also vanilla Javascript and Sass are my second languages. I cannot live without my iTerm2 with OHMYZSH and my beautiful purple theme in VSCode. Mac or Linux are my preference, I broke up with Windows a long time ago! (I will always remember you old friend)

title: Mentoring
subtitle: As a life coaching entusiast and coding lover, I genuinely care about people, and love helping fellow developer work on their art and tech.
toolstitle: Platforms that help us connect with each other
about: If you are a self learner, or you feel you need more guidance in the Frontend world, we can plan together a path where you can clarify all your doubts in the process of learning. A personalized assistance will help you to grow faster and also have someone to share your knowledge and build a community!
